Defines

Interrupt Control

#define cpu_irq_disable()   asm volatile("cli" ::: "memory")
 Disable interrupts globally.
#define cpu_irq_enable()   asm volatile("sei" ::: "memory")
 Enable interrupts globally.

Detailed Description
